creator: Ferrari
descriptionHtml:
MyFerrari is the dedicated app for Ferrari clients: an exclusive key to the doors of Maranello that will bring you right to the heart of the world of Ferrari and keep you connected to the legend.
It opens up a genuinely unique experience with you as the protagonist!
If you are an owner, you can register immediately, receive your password and user name, and access all of our exclusive personalised services and content.

Discover what you can do in the app:

MANAGE YOUR GARAGE

Live your car in the most intense, complete way possible! Thanks to our fleet management services, you can:

• See all the information on the Ferraris you have purchased and those awaiting delivery

• Add new models to your list

• Give your car a 360° check and receive alerts on all expiry/renewal dates and maintenance schedules

• Download your documents and manage your car’s contents

• Personalise images of your models and share them with Maranello experts

• Drive your car every day in the world of Ferrari


CONFIGURE YOUR NEXT FERRARI

MyFerrari allows you to configure the car you want to purchase and then share it with your dealership prior to a personalised consultancy session.

STAY CONNECTED WITH YOUR DEALER

Thanks to the app, your favourite Ferrari dealership will always be close by and you can:

• Find and select the Ferrari dealership closest to you

• Stay in constant contact with your regular dealership: constant consultancy always at your fingertips

• Request an appointment at an authorised Ferrari garage through the selected dealership

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN THE WORLD OF FERRARI

MyFerrari allows you to discover a whole world of events, news and products. All at your fingertips and there to browse whenever you want, wherever you want: exclusive content, premieres and previews, quirky facts and much more.

Using the app’s Calendar and Events services, you will be able to:

• See the events on the calendar, select the ones that interest you, and then synchronise them with your own diary

• Keep abreast of all the most significant news about Ferrari products

• Have a constantly updated overview of races and rallies


• Access photos, videos and other exclusive content

 
RECEIVE NOTIFICATIONS ON YOUR PHONE

If you want to be sure you never miss a thing, you can also configure the notification service on your smartphone to allow MyFerrari to alert you to updates on areas of interest to you.
Simply personalise the content you want to see and tailor it around your tastes. You can also manage your favourite sections and become the protagonist.

PRIVACY AND SAFETY

Protecting your personal information is important to us. We want you to feel protected at all times. For this reason, during registration, we will ask you for the email and phone number already added to the Ferrari system by your regular dealership.
Find out more about our privacy policy here: https://www.ferrari.com/it-IT/privacy-policy.

YOUR FEEDBACK

We are committed to constantly updating the functionalities of the MyFerrari app to improve our user experience. So we welcome your opinions and ask you to share any suggestions you may have with us.
You can post a review on the app store, write to us at ferrari.app@ferrari.com or, if you require specific assistance, contact our Customer Service at the following address: customerservice@owners.ferrari.com.
We will be happy to assist in any way we can.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
MyFerrari App is now more exclusive, attractive and reliable.
News introduced in 1.5.0 release are:
The easier registration process, through clearer graphic;
MyGarage section performance improvement and more updated info on your car;
Exclusive events introduced in the «Discover» section;
New Ferrari Premium section, with the possibility to:
Create, manage and monitor spare parts of your car;
Print your Premium Certificate.

MANAGE YOUR GARAGE

• See all the information on the Ferraris you have purchased and those awaiting delivery

• Add new models to your list

• Give your car a 360° check and receive alerts on all expiry/renewal dates and maintenance schedules

• Download your documents and manage your car’s contents

• Personalise images of your models and share them with Maranello experts

• Drive your car every day in the world of Ferrari


CONFIGURE YOUR NEXT FERRARI

creator: Ferrari
descriptionHtml:
MyFerrari is the exclusive application designed for Clienti Ferrari: the key to staying connected with the legendary Prancing Horse universe, where you can browse exclusive content and access personalised services in a simple, intuitive way.

If you are a Ferrari owner, register now, get your credentials and start to enjoy the unique, absorbing hands-on experience.


Explore the main features:


YOUR GARAGE
Enjoy your car collection with specially-dedicated services that allow you to:
- view key information about Ferraris you have purchased and those on consignment
- add new models to your list
- keep an all-round check on your vehicles and get alerts about deadlines and scheduled servicing
- upload your documents and manage your car-related content
- personalize the images of your models


YOUR SET-UPS
Set up your next Ferrari and share it with your dealer to get a personalised consultation.


YOUR DEALER
Stay in touch with your dealer and gain easy access to information. You will be able to:
- find and choose the nearest official Ferrari dealership
- contact your trusted dealer with ease
- request an appointment


EXCLUSIVELY FOR YOU
Stay up-to-date with the latest news in the Ferrari world, tailored exclusively for you

YOUR EVENTS
- easy management of all your events and schedules
- access the catalogue of Ferrari events personalised for you


FERRARI WORLD
Explore all areas of the Prancing Horse universe.


WIDGET
Quickly access news and stay up to speed on the world of Ferrari.


-

PRIVACY AND SECURITY
Protection of your personal data is of the utmost importance. We aim to protect you and your privacy at all times. For this reason, during registration, we will ask for the email and phone number entered into the Ferrari systems by the relevant dealer.

Find out more about our Privacy Policy here: https://www.ferrari.com/it-IT/privacy-policy

MyFerrari is the exclusive application designed for Clienti Ferrari: the key to staying connected with the legendary Prancing Horse universe, where you can browse exclusive content and access personalised services in a simple, intuitive way.

If you are a Ferrari owner, register now, get your credentials and start to enjoy the unique, absorbing hands-on experience.


Explore the main features:


YOUR GARAGE
Enjoy your car collection with specially-dedicated services that allow you to:
- view key information about Ferraris you have purchased and those on consignment
- add new models to your list
- keep an all-round check on your vehicles and get alerts about deadlines and scheduled servicing
- upload your documents and manage your car-related content
- personalize the images of your models


YOUR SET-UPS
Set up your next Ferrari and share it with your dealer to get a personalised consultation.


YOUR DEALER
Stay in touch with your dealer and gain easy access to information. You will be able to:
- find and choose the nearest official Ferrari dealership
- contact your trusted dealer with ease
- request an appointment


EXCLUSIVELY FOR YOU
Stay up-to-date with the latest news in the Ferrari world, tailored exclusively for you

YOUR EVENTS
- easy management of all your events and schedules
- access the catalogue of Ferrari events personalised for you


FERRARI WORLD
Explore all areas of the Prancing Horse universe.


WIDGET
Quickly access news and stay up to speed on the world of Ferrari.


-

PRIVACY AND SECURITY
Protection of your personal data is of the utmost importance. We aim to protect you and your privacy at all times. For this reason, during registration, we will ask for the email and phone number entered into the Ferrari systems by the relevant dealer.

Find out more about our Privacy Policy here: https://www.ferrari.com/it-IT/privacy-policy


YOUR FEEDBACK
We are constantly striving to update the functionality of MyFerrari to improve the user experience. We encourage you to share your feedback and proposals with us.

Feel free to post a review at the app store, write to us at ferrari.app@ferrari.com or, if you need personal assistance, contact our customer service at the following address: customerservice@owners.ferrari.com
descriptionShort: All of Ferrari’s service at your fingertips

creator: Ferrari
descriptionHtml:
MyFerrari is the exclusive application designed for Clienti Ferrari: the key to staying connected with the legendary Prancing Horse universe, where you can browse exclusive content and access personalised services in a simple, intuitive way.

If you are a Ferrari owner, register now, get your credentials and start to enjoy the unique, absorbing hands-on experience.


Explore the main features:


YOUR GARAGE
Enjoy your car collection with specially-dedicated services that allow you to:
- view key information about Ferraris you have purchased and those on consignment
- add new models to your list
- keep an all-round check on your vehicles and get alerts about deadlines and scheduled servicing
- upload your documents and manage your car-related content
- personalize the images of your models


MY FERRARI CONNECT
MyFerrari Connect allows you to check all your car’s key information anytime. This information will also be shared with your dealer so that you can schedule any service work and plan your Ferrari’s maintenance quickly and easily.
In the MyGarage section you will find:
- reporting of any faults
- the state of your Ferrari’s Manettino, lights, sensors and fluid level,
- the condition of the engine, brake system, high-voltage (for plug-in hybrid cars), and low-voltage battery.
You can also monitor the car’s odometer and its last known location, meaning the last place the vehicle was switched off.


YOUR SET-UPS
Set up your next Ferrari and share it with your dealer to get a personalised consultation.


YOUR DEALER
Stay in touch with your dealer and gain easy access to information. You will be able to:
- find and choose the nearest official Ferrari dealership
- contact your trusted dealer with ease
- request an appointment


EXCLUSIVELY FOR YOU
Stay up-to-date with the latest news in the Ferrari world, tailored exclusively for you

YOUR EVENTS
- easy management of all your events and schedules
- access the catalogue of Ferrari events personalised for you


FERRARI WORLD
Explore all areas of the Prancing Horse universe.


WIDGET
Quickly access news and stay up to speed on the world of Ferrari.


-

PRIVACY AND SECURITY
Protection of your personal data is of the utmost importance. We aim to protect you and your privacy at all times. For this reason, during registration, we will ask for the email and phone number entered into the Ferrari systems by the relevant dealer.

Find out more about our Privacy Policy here: https://www.ferrari.com/it-IT/privacy-policy


YOUR FEEDBACK
We are constantly striving to update the functionality of MyFerrari to improve the user experience. We encourage you to share your feedback and proposals with us.

Feel free to post a review at the app store, write to us at ferrari.app@ferrari.com or, if you need personal assistance, contact our customer service at the following address: customerservice@owners.ferrari.com
descriptionShort: All of Ferrari’s service at your fingertips

creator: Ferrari
descriptionHtml:
MyFerrari is the official application designed for Ferrari Clients. With just a few taps, you can access dedicated content and tailored services, taking your Ferrari experience to a new level.
Enter the world of the Prancing Horse and discover the main features:

HOME
• Receive personalized communications and invitations to Ferrari events
• Explore the configurations of all range models
• Access special editorial content, such as the Magazine and News

GARAGE
• Manage your vehicles within the virtual garage
• Access the connected vehicle details
• View documents, interactive guides, and certifications

EVENTS
• Discover upcoming Ferrari events and relive past ones with photos and videos
• Consult the Ferrari Calendar to find events worldwide
• Book your upcoming Ferrari events

ON TRACK (reserved for users registered in the championships)
• View the schedule of upcoming rounds
• Access photos and videos of the championships

PROFILE
• Easily access your profile information from any section of the app
• Edit your personal information at any time
If you are the owner of a Ferrari, register now and get ready to experience a personalized journey.
descriptionShort: All of Ferrari’s service at your fingertips
